meanings.definition: Lack of recognition or gratitude for something.
meanings.sent1: Her inappreciativeness towards his hard work was hurtful.
meanings.sent2: The inappreciativeness of the audience dampened his enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The inappreciativeness of the cat towards the new toy was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The inappreciativeness of the barren land for the rain was evident.
meanings.sent5: The inappreciativeness of the student towards the teacher's efforts was disappointing.

meanings.sent1: His inappreciativeness for their help was unkind.

meanings.sent3: The inappreciativeness of the plant for sunlight was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The inappreciativeness of the storm for the calm sea was striking.
meanings.sent5: The inappreciativeness of the customer towards the excellent service was surprising.

meanings.definition: Failure to value or acknowledge something.
meanings.sent1: The inappreciativeness of his talent by others was disheartening.
meanings.sent2: Her inappreciativeness for the beauty of nature puzzled her friends.
meanings.sent3: The inappreciativeness of the clock for time was amusingly ironic.
meanings.sent4: The inappreciativeness of the mirror for reflecting her beauty was metaphorical.
meanings.sent5: The inappreciativeness of the team towards his leadership was evident in their actions.
